discussion.p: There are no requires corresponding to F of std::function.
discussion.blockquote: We agree with the proposed resolution. Move to Tentatively Ready. If issue is accepted, the changes to the second constructor in this issue are moot.

blockquote.pre: template<class F, Allocator Alloc> requires ConstructibleWithAllocator<F, Alloc> && call=Callable<F, ArgTypes...> && Convertible<call::result_type, R> function(allocator_arg_t, const Alloc&, F); template<class F, Allocator Alloc> requires ConstructibleWithAllocator<F,Alloc> && call=Callable<F, ArgTypes...> && Convertible<call::result_type, R> function(allocator_arg_t, const Alloc&, F&&);
